title: Weird screeching noise in highlight recording
body: is there anyway I can fix?

replies.body: I've seen a number of players who had this issue and most of them were able to fix this by re-recording that highlight but without using the fast forward feature. Try making that highlight again without altering the gameplay speed and let me know if that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XYYJh2Y8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-05T01:16:49.918+0000)
>
> I've seen a number of players who had this issue and most of them were able to fix this by re-recording that highlight but without using the fast forward feature. Try making that highlight again without altering the gameplay speed and let me know if that helps!
Thank you very much.

no one more question.

how to upload a highlight?
